title: EduMentor: Learn Any time Any where
description: An eLearning platform offering a wide range of interactive courses for personalized learning experiences.
feature1: Attractive Homepage:  Engage users with a visually appealing and interactive home page
feature2: Course Search Option : Helps in searching personalized courses.
feature3: Engaging Multimedia Content: Immerse yourself in interactive lessons, quizzes, and multimedia resources.
feature4: Dynamic Course Catalog: Explore a diverse array of courses tailored to your interests and goals.
feature5: Responsive designing that suits across all screen sizes.
